body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Car Dealership customer service. My name is Peter Cox and I'll be assisting you today. May I kindly have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Grace King.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Grace. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with your phone number so we can better assist you in resolving your issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is six eight one two three four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Grace. I appreciate that. Can you also confirm your email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is gking@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Grace. Is there anything else you would like to share with me today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling nervous about a recent return I made to your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Grace. Thank you for sharing your concerns with me. Let's work together to resolve this. I appreciate your time and patience. Thank you for reaching out to us today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. Have a great day, Grace. Goodbye.
